text: Gwangmyeongsageori Station is a train station of Seoul Subway Line 7, in Gwangmyeong, Gyeonggi-do. This stations was first opened with name "Gwangmyeong Station", but because of KTX Gwangmyeong Station's opening, this station has changed the name. Gwangmyeongsageori Station is sometimes called as Gwangmyeong Junction Station, because the korean latter "sageori" means 4-way junction. == History== * February 29, 2000 : Opened with opening of Seoul Subway Line 7 Sinpung - Onsu, as Gwangmyeong Station * March 29, 2004 : Changed name to Gwangmyeongsageori Station with opening of KTX Gwangmyeong Station == Station structure == The upperbound(For Jangam) side platform (in below diagram, platform on the right side) is not used normally, but used at morning to depart the train from train depot. === Platforms === Cheolsan ↑ Down Up ↓ Cheonwang Upward For Dobongsan·Jangam Downward For Onsu·Bupyeong-gu Office == Passenger Count == Data of 2000 is calculated from February 29 (First Opened) ~ December 31.
